Room.LongDescription: You are in a big cavern. There are passages leading to the north and east.
You are in a small cave with water dripping from the ceiling. There is a passage leading south and a difficult crawl down a pit.
You are in a long hallway stretching to the east and west.
You are in a beautifully carved chamber whose walls are solid marble. There is an exit to the west.
You are at the bottom of a damp pit. The only way out is up.
